mainframe GUI module¶

This GUI module is created using wxUIEditor (https://github.com/KeyWorksRW/wxUiEditor). To make changes to the controls, open the *.wxui file in the ./dependencies folder with wxUIEditor.

mainFrame class generated by wxUiEditor.

class dependencies.mainframe.mainFrame(parent, id=-1, title='', pos=wx.Point(-1, -1), size=wx.Size(1000, 800), style=541138496, name=b'frame')[source]¶

Bases: Frame

Methods

myNumValid(event)

Method called when a key is pressed.
myNumValid(event: KeyEvent)[source]¶

Method called when a key is pressed.

This method enables only numeric values to be entered in the grid. When non-numeric values are entered, the character is blocked from being entered. The method also checks if the TAB key is pressed to enable tab navigation between the cells in the grid.

Parameters:
eventwxEvent

wxEVT_CHAR event generated when a character key on the keyboard is pressed.

298    """
299
300# ************* End of generated code ***********
301# DO NOT EDIT THIS COMMENT BLOCK!
302#
303# Code below this comment block will be preserved
304# if the code for this class is re-generated.
305# ***********************************************
306
307    def myNumValid(self, event: wx.KeyEvent):
308        r"""Method called when a key is pressed.
309
310        This method enables only numeric values to be entered in the grid. When non-numeric values are entered,
311        the character is blocked from being entered. The method also checks if the :kbd:`TAB` key is pressed to
312        enable tab navigation between the cells in the grid.
313
314            Parameters
315            ----------
316            event : wxEvent
317                wxEVT_CHAR event generated when a character key on the keyboard is pressed.
318
319        """
320
321        key = event.GetKeyCode()
322        if chr(key) in "0123456789.":
323            event.Skip()
324        elif not (chr(key).isalpha() or chr(key) in "+*/\\][';/,`=") and event.GetModifiers() != wx.MOD_SHIFT:
325            event.Skip()
326        elif key == wx.WXK_TAB and event.GetModifiers() == wx.MOD_SHIFT:
327            event.Skip()
